tp:docstring.p: The Compat interface holds properties necessary for maintaining the libmissioncontrol compatible layer.

arg.name: type
arg.tp:docstring: D-Bus interface name representing the channel type

arg.name: handle
arg.tp:docstring: A nonzero integer handle representing a contact, room, list, etc.

arg.name: handle_type
arg.tp:docstring: A integer representing the channel type

arg.name: operation_id
arg.tp:docstring: A integer representing an operation ID, which can then be used for cancelling the request

method.name: RequestChannelWithStringHandle
method.tp:docstring: Requests a channel by a string handle.

arg.name: type
arg.tp:docstring: D-Bus interface name representing the channel type

arg.name: handle
arg.tp:docstring: A string handle representing a contact, room, list, etc.

arg.name: handle_type
arg.tp:docstring: A integer representing the channel type

arg.name: operation_id
arg.tp:docstring: A integer representing an operation ID, which can then be used for cancelling the request

arg.name: operation_id
